Name: Accuracy
Desc: Increases the accuracy of a power.

Name: Activation Decrease
Desc: Decreases interrupt time of powers that can be interrupted.

Name: Confuse Duration
Desc: Increasees the duration of a Confuse power.

Name: Damage Increase
Desc: Increases the Damage done by a power.

Name: Defense Buff
Desc: Enhances the effectiveness of defense buffs

Name: Defense Debuff
Desc: Enhances the effectiveness of defense debuffs.

Name: Endurance Modification
Desc: Enhances Endurance Drain or Recovery powers.

Name: Endurance Reduction
Desc: Decreases the endurance cost of a power.

Name: Fear Duration
Desc: Increases the duration of a fear power.

Name: Flight Speed
Desc: Increases the speed of a Flight power.

Name: Healing
Desc: Enhances the healing ability of a power.

Name: Hold Duration
Desc: Increases the duration of a hold power.

Name: Immobilisation Duration
Desc: Increases the duration of an immobilization power.

Name: Intangibility Duration
Desc: Increases the duration of an intangibiltiy power.

Name: Jumping
Desc: Increases the distance of a jump power.

Name: Knockback Distance
Desc: Increases the knockback and knockup distance.

Name: Range
Desc: Enhances the range of a power.

Name: Recharge Reduction
Desc: Reduces the recharge time of a power.

Name: Resist Damage
Desc: Enhances the damage resistance of a power.

Name: Run Speed
Desc: Increases the speed of a run power.

Name: Sleep Duration
Desc: Increases the duration of a sleep power.

Name: Slow
Desc: Increases the effectiveness of powers that slow.

Name: Disorient Duration
Desc: Increases the duration of a disorient power.

Name: Taunt Duration
Desc: Increases the duration a taunted target will stay on you.

Name: To Hit Buff
Desc: Enhances the effectiveness of accuracy buffs.

Name: To Hit Debuff
Desc: Enhances the effectiveness of accuracy debuffs.
